page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content:
There are 2 primary schools but no Grammar, Secondary or Play Schools in this block.
The Secondary Schools are found in Omagh, but some children chose to travel to those in the neighbouring county.
The reason why 2 primary schools are found in such a small area is that this is a mixed relgion area.
The Protestants and other small sects attend the State Primary School called Trillick County Primary. The Roman Catholics send their children to St.Scires a school controlled by the Roman Catholic Church. 150 primary school children attend these two primary schools.
